channel.title: Suggestions to improve the graphics board
channel.description:
I have a few simple and easy ideas to improve the graphics section! Here are a few.
[b]No.1[/b]
A "Request a sig" Child board.
[b]No.2[/b]
SOTM (Sig of the month) Will have more entrys and more chances of winning. More time taken on the sigs. (Taken from Fastballz idea)
[b]No.3[/b]
Some graphics section rules. * i know we don't really need them, but! they might just come in handy *
[b]No.4[/b]
MAYBE title tags.
Yes some of them do suck but they are just suggestions, there is no reason to think these will be emplyed.

item.title: Suggestions to improve the graphics board

item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

Shouldn’t this be in the forum discussion?

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions to improve the graphics board
item.dc:creator: @googlethis googlethis
item.description:
@googlethis wrote:

How about weekly sig competitions, the winners go on to a biweekly competition, and the winners of those to a monthly?
As in:
Week 1 Winner----
|- Winner -
Week 2 Winner---- |
|- Overall winner
Week 3 Winner---- |
|- Winner -
Week 4 Winner----

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestions to improve the graphics board

item.title: Suggestions to improve the graphics board
item.dc:creator: @welshy welshy
item.description:
@welshy wrote:

[quote=“FastBallz, post:9, topic:25277”][quote author=bigmac link=topic=38087.msg463594#msg463594 date=1163628742]
No.3 says nothing about bringing more activity to the board.
And yes SOTD does seem good, but you would need help to enforce it every day and such.
I would personally say you and Fastaballz for this.
And title tags just to keep things neat =)
[/quote]

And for the prize…Well…If you win you get to go up to the SOTW and from SOTW maybe go to SOTM + the avatar…[/quote]thats a good idea because alot of people will end up having the avatar lol

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestions to improve the graphics board

item.title: Suggestions to improve the graphics board
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Well, why would number 3 bring more activity to the forum? Also, why would title tags :S?

SOTD sounds good, but I’d rather have GOTM and SOTW.

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestions to improve the graphics board

item.title: Suggestions to improve the graphics board
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

If there were a SOTM, it would really have to be Graphic of the month. I doube anyone would need to spend that much time on a small sig, but they might for a large background or c4d rendering.

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestions to improve the graphics board

item.title: Suggestions to improve the graphics board
item.dc:creator: @bigmac bigmac
item.description:
@bigmac wrote:

FastBallz:

SOTD Anyone (Sig Of the Day)…Though…Chris would really need to be active for that one…

Not bad… but would have to have a small prize. And would also need sort of a SOTD staff member to help out. because Chris gets busy sometimes.

Read full topic

item.description:

Meh, if anything, we could do with less time on SOTW. Seriously, if it takes you more than a week to make a sig, well… no comment.
